Krantz arrives at the institution from the Museum of Modern Art, where she has served as interim director since January 2019.“Mary Ellen Krantz is an experienced leader in the field of contemporary art and an outstanding organizer,” said director William C. Williams. “Her work has made her a favorite of our artists, and she has cultivated New York’s reputation as a hub for contemporary art.
